message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can always negotiate.
Your turn, Alice. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  It accounts for the decreasing value over time and is a much better starting point for negotiation.
I'm willing to move closer to your proposal, but 65/35 is still more fair considering the inflation impacting us differently. Let's settle this now.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm proposing a 55/45 split. It's a compromise that acknowledges the time pressure and the fact that the deal gets worse for both of us with each round.
